messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] How to write your opinion to this group
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/24/2003 8:01:11 PM Eastern Daylight Time, grlynbl@aol.com writes: And, it s the fundies in every group ... Radical unschooler? FUNDIE
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/24/2003 8:01:11 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
grlynbl@... writes:> And, it's the "fundies" in every group
> that give that group a bad name or incorrect perceptions. I think anything
> in
> the extreme is not healthy..( physically, mentally, socially, or
> emotionally).
> A "fundie" will say that whatever thier particular beliefs are can ONLY be
> practiced in the extreme measure. They will say.. well, you dont do this or
>
> that, so you are not a ___________

Radical unschooler? FUNDIE UNschooler? I *may* fall into that group! <G>

~Kelly, the extremist, fundamentalist unschooler! <G>

~Kelly, who, by nature, is a hedonist. But it's too expensive---so she has to
remain a realist! Bummer.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
